question: At which of the following places the famous relief scene of Vishnu rescuing the earth from the waters in the form of Nri-Varaha can be found?
explanation: The famous relief scene of God Vishnu rescuing the earth from the waters in the form of Nri-Varaha which has the body of a man and head of a boar can be found in the caves at Udaigiri, near Vidisha.
